briefdescription.para: Wrapping function for reading all the forcing data.

detaileddescription.para: Reads bathymetry and other forcing data into the provided Forcing structure.

T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data structure
wrapping function for reading all the forcing data

briefdescription.para: Single parameter version of readstaticforcing(int step, T& Sforcing).

detaileddescription.para: Calls readstaticforcing with step set to 0.

T
Data type
Sforcing
Static forcing structure to be read and allocated
single parameter version of readstaticforcing(int step,T& Sforcing) readstaticforcing(0, Sforcing);

briefdescription.para: Allocate and read static (i.e. not varying in time) forcing data. Used for Bathymetry, roughness, deformation, etc.

detaileddescription.para:
step
Time step (usually 0 for static data)
Sforcing
Static forcing structure to be read and allocated
Allocate and read static (i.e. not varying in time) forcing Used for Bathy, roughness, deformation

briefdescription.para: Initialize dynamic forcing data (Rain, wind, Atm pressure).

detaileddescription.para: Reads dynamic forcing header and allocates memory for dynamic forcing arrays.

parameterdescription.para: Use GPU acceleration
Model parameters
Dynamic forcing structure

briefdescription.para: Deprecated function (!!!) to read dynamic forcing data for a given time.

detaileddescription.para: Reads and allocates dynamic forcing arrays for the specified time.

gpgpu
Use GPU acceleration
totaltime
Current simulation time
Dforcing
Dynamic forcing structure
This is a deprecated function! See InitDynforcing() instead

briefdescription.para: Read bathymetry data and apply corrections if needed.

detaileddescription.para: Reads static bathymetry data and applies correction for positive-down convention (special case of readstaticforcing(Sforcing)).

parameterdescription.para: If 1, apply positive-down correction
Static forcing structure

briefdescription.para: Read CRS information from bathymetry file metadata (last one read). Reads CRS information from the metadata of the specified bathymetry file.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the CRS string
Static forcing structure

briefdescription.para: Read boundary polygon segment and create polygon structure.

detaileddescription.para: Reads boundary polygon segment based on specified keywords or file input.

parameterdescription.para: Boundary segment structure
Model parameters

simplesect.para: Polygon structure representing the boundary segment

briefdescription.para: Read boundary forcing files (water levels or nest files).

detaileddescription.para:
Reads boundary forcing files based on their extension (.nc for nest files, others for water level files). Applies zsoffset correction if specified in model parameters.
filename
Name of the boundary forcing file
XParam
Model parameters
Vector of SLTS structures containing boundary information

briefdescription.para: Read water level boundary file. Reads water level boundary file and extracts time and water level data. Applies reference date adjustment if provided.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the water level boundary file
Reference date for time adjustment

simplesect.para: Vector of SLTS structures containing time and water level data

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string ncfile, std::string varname, int hor, double eps, double bndxo, double bndxmax, double bndy)
memberdef.name: readNestfile

briefdescription.para: Read boundary nesting data from a NetCDF file. Reads boundary nesting data from a specified NetCDF file and variable name. Supports both horizontal and vertical boundaries.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the NetCDF file
Name of the variable to read
If 1, read horizontal boundary (top/bottom); if 0 read vertical boundary (left/right)
Small value to avoid numerical issues
Starting coordinate of the boundary
Ending coordinate of the boundary
Fixed coordinate of the boundary

simplesect.para: Vector of SLTS structures containing time and water level data

briefdescription.para: Read flow data from a specified file, for river forcing for example. Reads flow data from a specified file and extracts time and flow rate information. Applies reference date adjustment if provided.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the flow data file
Reference date for time adjustment

simplesect.para: Vector of Flowin structures containing time and flow rate data

briefdescription.para: Read rain/atmospheric pressure data from a specified file for spatially uniform forcing. Reads rain/atmospheric pressure data from a specified file and extracts time and wind speed information. Applies reference date adjustment if provided.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the rain/atmospheric pressure data file
Reference date for time adjustment

simplesect.para: Vector of Windin structures containing time and wind speed data

briefdescription.para: Read wind data from a specified file for spatially uniform forcing. Reads wind data from a specified file and extracts time, wind speed, wind direction, and calculates u and v wind components. Applies reference date adjustment if provided.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the wind data file
Reference date for time adjustment
Grid rotation angle in radians

simplesect.para: Vector of Windin structures containing time, wind speed, wind direction, and u/v components

briefdescription.para: Read polygon from a specified file. Reads polygon vertices from a specified file and ensures the polygon is closed. Calculates bounding box of the polygon.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the polygon file

simplesect.para: Polygon structure containing vertices and bounding box information

briefdescription.para: Split a string into a vector of substrings based on a specified delimiter.

parameterdescription.para: The input string to be split
The delimiter character used for splitting

briefdescription.para: Split a string into a vector of substrings based on common delimiters (tab, space, comma). Tries tab, space, and comma as delimiters and returns the first successful split with the expected number of elements.

parameterdescription.para: The input string to be split
The expected number of elements after splitting

simplesect.para: Vector of substrings if successful; empty vector otherwise

briefdescription.para: Read static forcing data from various file formats based on the file extension. Supports reading from .md, .nc, .bot/.dep, and .asc files.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the forcing parameter structure (e.g., StaticForcingP<float>, deformmap<float>, etc.)
Current time step for reading time-dependent data (if applicable)
Forcing parameter structure containing file information and data storage

briefdescription.para: Read dynamic forcing data from a NetCDF file based on the current simulation time. Interpolates between time steps to obtain the current forcing values. Handles NaN values and clamps edges if specified.

parameterdescription.para: Current simulation time
Dynamic forcing parameter structure containing file information and data storage

briefdescription.para: Read dynamic forcing metadata/header from a NetCDF file. Extracts grid size, spacing, origin, and time information.

parameterdescription.para: Dynamic forcing parameter structure containing file information
Simulation parameters (used for reference date)

simplesect.para: Updated dynamic forcing parameter structure with metadata

briefdescription.para: Read static forcing metadata/header from various file formats based on the file extension. Supports reading from .md, .nc, .bot/.dep, and .asc files. Extracts grid size, spacing, origin, and other relevant information.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the forcing parameter structure (e.g., StaticForcingP<float>, deformmap<float>, etc.)
Forcing parameter structure containing file information

simplesect.para: Updated forcing parameter structure with metadata

memberdef.definition: template StaticForcingP< float > readforcinghead< StaticForcingP< float > >
memberdef.name: readforcinghead< StaticForcingP< float > >

briefdescription.para: Read header information from an MD bathymetry file (or other MD input map). Extracts grid size (nx, ny), grid spacing (dx), and grid rotation angle (grdalpha).

parameterdescription.para: Name of the MD bathymetry file
Reference to store the number of grid points in the x-direction
Reference to store the number of grid points in the y-direction
Reference to store the grid spacing
Reference to store the grid rotation angle in radians

briefdescription.para: Read bathymetry data from an MD file into a provided array. Parses the MD file format and fills the provided array with bathymetry values.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the MD bathymetry file
Reference to the array to store bathymetry values

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: readXBbathy

briefdescription.para: Read bathymetry data from an XBeach-style .bot/.dep file into a provided array. Parses the file format and fills the provided array with bathymetry values.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the XBeach-style bathymetry file
Number of grid points in the x-direction
Number of grid points in the y-direction
Reference to the array to store bathymetry values

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, int *&zb)
memberdef.name: readXBbathy< int >

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, float *&zb)
memberdef.name: readXBbathy< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int &nx, int &ny, double &dx, double &xo, double &yo, double &grdalpha)
memberdef.name: readbathyASCHead

briefdescription.para: Read header information from an ASC (bathymetry) file. Extracts grid size (nx, ny), grid spacing (dx), origin (xo, yo), and grid rotation angle (grdalpha). Adjusts origin if the file uses corner registration.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the ASC bathymetry file
Reference to store the number of grid points in the x-direction
Reference to store the number of grid points in the y-direction
Reference to store the grid spacing in the x-direction
Reference to store the x-coordinate of the grid origin
Reference to store the y-coordinate of the grid origin
Reference to store the grid rotation angle in radians

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, T *&zb)
memberdef.name: readbathyASCzb

briefdescription.para: Read (bathymetry) data from an ASC file into a provided array. Parses the ASC file format and fills the provided array with bathymetry values.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the ASC bathymetry file
Number of grid points in the x-direction
Number of grid points in the y-direction
Reference to the array to store bathymetry values

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, int *&zb)
memberdef.name: readbathyASCzb< int >

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string filename, int nx, int ny, float *&zb)
memberdef.name: readbathyASCzb< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, T clamp, T *z)
memberdef.name: clampedges

briefdescription.para: Clamp the edges of a 2D array to a specified value. Sets the values at the edges of a 2D array to a specified clamp value.

parameterdescription.para: Number of grid points in the x-direction
Number of grid points in the y-direction
Value to set at the edges
Pointer to the 2D array (flattened as 1D) to be modified

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, float denanval, T *z)
memberdef.name: denan

briefdescription.para: Replace NaN values in a 2D array with a specified value. Iterates through a 2D array and replaces any NaN values with the specified denanval.

parameterdescription.para: Number of grid points in the x-direction
Number of grid points in the y-direction
Value to replace NaN values with
Pointer to the 2D array (flattened as 1D) to be modified

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, float denanval, float *z)
memberdef.name: denan< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, float denanval, double *z)

memberdef.argsstring: (int nx, int ny, float denanval, int *z)
